AIRTABLE_KEY.description: An Airtable API key which can be obtained here: https://airtable.com/account

AIRTABLE_BASE.description: The base ID of the base containing the table to be synced. watch this video on how to find: https://youtu.be/gGL0MWc-98Y

AIRTABLE_TABLE_NAME.description: The table within the base to be synced

MANYC_NEW_REQ_URL.description: This will be provided to you by MANYC

MANYC_UPDATE_REQ_URL.description: This will be provided to you by MANYC

MANYC_DELETE_REQ_URL.description: This will be provided to you by MANYC

FIELD_MAP_ID.description: A field to store MANYC's ID

FIELD_MAP_SOURCE.description: Source field, the source of the needs request

FIELD_MAP_SOURCE_ID.description: Source ID field, unique id from the source

STATUS_MAP_JUST_CANT_1.description: Optional additional status that maps to `just can't`

STATUS_MAP_ASSIGNED_1.description: Optional additional status that maps to 'assigned'

POLL_FIELD_META.description: Utility field needed by airtable gateway to track changes in field values

POLL_FIELD_LAST_MODIFIED.description: Utility field needed by airtable gateway to know when the record was last modified

POLL_FIELD_LAST_PROCESSED.description: Utility field needed by airtable gateway to determine when the record was last processed
